Welcome to my personal website! I am currently in my third year of pursuing a Ph.D. in Biostatistics at the University of Michigan. My academic journey revolves around a passion for developing computational-efficient Bayesian models that address real-world challenges. My doctoral dissertation is focused on non-invasive EEG-based Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs).

## Interests

- Brain-Computer-Interface 
- Machine Learning
